Description: Ostracon, small fragment of the body of a brown-red ribbed and ridged vessel, the interior is covered with a yellow-brown granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and bears traces of a black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394127) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394127)
